CustomField.description: Time to First Response for GNO Sourcing Team. NOT PSE Created by RoseTree
CustomField.formula: ROUND(10 * ( (5 * FLOOR((DATEVALUE(RecoveryTimeStamp__c) - DATE(1996, 01, 01)) / 7) + MIN(5, MOD(DATEVALUE(RecoveryTimeStamp__c) - DATE(1996, 01, 01), 7) + MIN(1, 24 / 10 * (MOD( IF(HOUR(TIMEVALUE(RecoveryTimeStamp__c)) >= 13, RecoveryTimeStamp__c, DATETIMEVALUE( TEXT(DATEVALUE(RecoveryTimeStamp__c)) + " " + '13:00:00' )) - DATETIMEVALUE('1996-01-01 13:00:00'), 1 ))) )) - (5 * FLOOR((DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) - DATE(1996, 01, 01)) / 7) + MIN(5, MOD(DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) - DATE(1996, 01, 01), 7) + MIN(1, 24 / 10 * (MOD( IF(HOUR(TIMEVALUE(CreatedDate)) >= 13, CreatedDate, DATETIMEVALUE( TEXT(DATEVALUE(CreatedDate)) + " " + '13:00:00' )) - DATETIMEVALUE('1996-01-01 13:00:00'), 1 ))) )) ), 2)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: First Response Time for GNO Sourcing Team.
CustomField.label: Time to First Response (Business hrs)
